text_block_list.name: Cheers
text_block_list.text: (Cheers!!)

text_block_list.name: Cheers
text_block_list.text: Tickezou! Tickezou!

After the goal, from the stand to the 
winner “Tickezou call” was heard.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Woah, this is amazing…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Of course, it was the greatest Derby.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Sob… Derby…! My own… Derby, Derby…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Geez, you just got out of here.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: There's only one, that's the victory road you ran through.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishin, Hayahide!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
It was the best race ever… It was the 
best Derby ever! Our own Derby!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
However, this is not going to happen next. It's my turn to show 
my back in the “Kikkashou”.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Yeah, Our goal is not the Derby. There are many races after this.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Of course! Let's continue running with the three of us from now 
on! Alright! Aim, beyond the Derby～～～!

The voices honoring Winning Ticket echoed 
in the underground bar in the racetrack.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: It's a great call. You can hear it anywhere on the racetrack.

It may be that Tickezou's feelings were conveyed 
to the people who supported her.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer-san～!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I did it! I won the Derby!! Even now 
it still feels like a dream～!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations, Winning Ticket-san. Ehehe, 
didn't you want to get more cheering?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, that may be right, but there 
will be an interview after this.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Besides, that's not the end of the goal. I have a chance to get a 
lot of calls from now on!

Yes, “Winning the Derby” no matter what dream 
you fulfill, this is not the end.

Winning Ticket races will still continueーBecause 
the drama is still going on.
choice_data_list: Let's get a lot of calls in the future!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Let's do our best together, Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Then, Tazuna-san! Let's go to the interview! I refused the 
interview before the Derby, so I have to respond to that!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text: Then, the winner of the amazing Derby, Winning Ticket-san!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
After the race's big call, what kind 
of feeling were you listening to?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to make it a great Derby, so I was happy that it was 
transmitted to everyone!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
What was the key to winning the battle 
against your rivals called “BNW”?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Of course there was a lot of training involved…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
My feelings for the Derby and my desire to write as a friend and 
respond to my promises with my rivals in a great way, and thenー

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
My feelings to make the trainer who supported 
me so much into a “Derby Trainer”!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text: And last, a word of your feelings for winning the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm the Horse Girl who won this great Derby, Winning Ticket!!
